data.meanings: to write or read, dig. sahfatun (pl. sihaaf) - hollow, large dish. sahiifa - surface of the earth. sahiifatun (pl. suhuf) - heap of a book.
data.sentence: The word الصُّحُفُ comes from the root ص ح ف and is associated with the meanings: to write or read, dig. sahfatun (pl. sihaaf) - hollow, large dish. sahiifa - surface of the earth. sahiifatun (pl. suhuf) - heap of a book.

data.meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
data.sentence: The word نُشِرَتْ comes from the root ن ش ر and is associated with the meanings: to spread out, bring back to life, resuscitate, be extended, lay open, unfold, expand, display, spread abroad.
